name: Lillian Choi
role: UX Designer at Samsung Electronics America
about: As a recent design graduate from UC Davis, Lillian Choi is a UX Designer based in Silicon Valley and currently working at Samsung Electronics America. As a humble advocate for accessible and equitable designs in the digital healthcare industry, Lillian strives to share her knowledge and passion with junior designers in the community.

name: Nathan Gao
role: Experience Design Lead at Northwestern Mutual
about: Nathan Gao is an Experience Design Lead at Northwestern Mutual, where he guides a small team of talented designers in tackling complex projects, helping everyday people navigate difficult life  and financial decisions. An avid technologist, music fan, and former operations guy, Nathan is a big believer in using design to shape better complex systems; helping those who have less, live better.

name: Jered Odegard
role: Coach at Zeal; Former Product Design Leader at Redfin, Expedia
about: Jered is a career and leadership coach (CPCC, ACC) and former Head of Product Design. He has built world-class product for fortune 500 like üèù Expedia and raised design teams from startup to IPO at üè° Redfin. He is passionate about giving introverted designers a voice and creative ownership.

name: Vanessa Wong
about: As a curious visual designer, Vanessa explored agency/in-house/freelance environments and dabbled in diverse industries across education, consumer products, e-commerce, tech, public services, fashion/lifestyle, and entertainment. With her passion for education, she also co-founded an educational nonprofit called Menti during the pandemic to help young adults access learning resources.
